name: No Sweat
description:
The heat is turning up, which is causing many forests and environments to set ablaze. You are a water blob that is able to freeze into an ice cube. You must use your abilities to put out all of the fires before the earth sets to flames! You however must time your ability to freeze and melt with the obstacles that are thrown your way, and to find a way to utilize your multiple forms, and put them to many uses.

Note: This is my first ever project in Unity. I want to give special thanks to CurdleGames for helping and guiding me through the process of learning a new engine in a jam. I hope you enjoy this little jam game we made!

Controls

Keyboard / Controller

Z or C / X - Interactable (Paddles, Springs, etc.)

X or Space / A - Jump

Shift / B - Change Form

Arrow Keys / Left Stick - Move

R / Select - Reset Level
